identified_features.reasoning: Two through holes on the top surface.
A step is present at the junction of the two main sections.
Three circular pockets are present, one on each side and one on the bottom.
A chamfer is visible on the edge where the base meets the upper section.
Three fillets are present, one on each pocket and one on the chamfered edge.
Two bosses are present, one on each side of the part.
One freeform feature is present, a protrusion on the lower right side.
